item.title: So many cute girls at the beach today, god damn. T...
item.description: So many cute girls at the beach today, god damn. There was one group of 6 that had such perfect asses, tight colorful bikinis, and were full of energy and cheer. Wish they could be full of my cum, too. Only issue is that they're all almost certainly 15.

item.title: The only thing that can contend with the present i...
item.description: The only thing that can contend with the present is the past or an imagined future.

item.title: Just saw a really hot chick at the beach hit a vap...
item.description: Just saw a really hot chick at the beach hit a vape. Attractiveness instantly lowered. I thought, "Instead of sucking the vape, why don't you suck my dick?"

item.title: What if I literally just killed everyone in this c...
item.description: What if I literally just killed everyone in this coffee shop right now. It wouldn't even really be that hard. There's a basic-ass looking white dude, mid-life crisis-having for sure, with a 6/10 Asian girlfriend with a 9/10 ass with him, and I literally can just grab a pair of scissors, stab him through the eye, and kidnap her. It wouldn't even be that hard.
